parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the edge node.

parameters.name: EnsRegionIds
parameters.description: The IDs of edge nodes. You can specify 1 to 100 IDs.

parameters.name: NetworkIds
parameters.description: The IDs of VPCs You can specify 1 to 100 IDs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1 to 50**. Default value: **10**.
